job.title: 高级软件工程师
job.description: This job is based in Beijing, China. 高级软件工程师- Senior Software Engineer 工作职责：根据需求快速开发产品配套软件根据产线要求开发生产工具软件编写研发项目文档及时完成部门经理临时交办的其他任务。任职资格计算机或电子相关专业, 本科及以上学历,一本院校优先.精通一门编程语言(Python优先)熟悉CAN总线、UART、TCP等通信方式有团队合作精神，能及时分享知识和经验；五年工作经历有大型仪器类项目经验者优先.Senior Software EngineerJob Responsibilities:1. Quickly develop product supporting software based on requirement2. Develop production tool software according based on requirements3. Write R&D project documentation4. Complete other tasks assigned by the department manager in a timely manner.QualificationsComputer or electronics related major, bachelor degree or aboveProficient in a programming language (Python is preferred)Familiar with CAN bus, UART, TCP and other communication methodsHave a team spirit and be able to share knowledge and experience in a timely manner;Five years of work experienceExperience in large-scale instrument projects is preferred.
